original_text: And the crowds with one accord paid attention to what was being said by Philip, when they heard him and saw the signs that he did.
korean_text: 무리가 빌립의 말도 듣고 행하는 표적도 보고 한마음으로 그가 하는 말을 따르더라

sentences.original_text: And the crowds with one accord paid attention
to what was being said by Philip
and saw the signs that he did
